p: The results of haematological parameters ( TableÂ 3) show a significant decrease of WBCs count in females at dose 1000 mg/kg body weight/day compared to the control group, while the amount of lymphocytes increased significantly at the same dose. In males, there was a significant increase of WBCs, Gran, MCV, MCH and MCHC amounts at 500 and 1000 mg/kg body weight/day, but a significant decrease in Lym amount at 250, 500 and 1000 mg/kg body weight/day. We also observed a significant decrease of RBCs counts and Hct at 500 and 1000 mg/kg body weight/day compared to the control group.
